DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate use state-of art internet psycho-educational program clinical practice ( Teens-Connect ) , compare use standard widely available internet diabetes program youth ( Planet D™ ) mixed-method randomized clinical trial design .
DOC.brief_title: Teens-Connect : Preventive Psycho-education Transitioning Teens With Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The aim : 1 . To evaluate efficacy cost-effectiveness provider-prescribed Teens-Connect ( TEENCOPE™+Managing Diabetes ) pediatric diabetes practice compare prescription Planet D™ . The hypothesis study : 1 . Youth participate Teens-Connect good metabolic control ( A1c ) quality life ( QOL ) participate Planet D. 2 . These effect mediate improvement stress/coping , self-efficacy , diabetes problem-solving , self-management . 3 . Teens-Connect prescribed provider diabetes clinic cost-effective approach reduce A1c improve quality-adjusted life year ( QALYs ) youth T1D . 2 . To compare reach , efficacy , adoption , implementation , maintenance ( RE-AIM ) two provider-prescribed psycho-educational internet program .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed type 1 diabetes least 6 month Age 11 14 year Englishspeaking Assent Parent/guardian consent participate study *Previous exposure TEENCOPE and/or Managing Diabetes
